tspan.tspan: Have you seen him who takes his own lust
(vain desires) as his ilâh (god)?
And Allâh knowing (him as such), left him
astray, and sealed his hearing and his
heart, and put a cover on his sight.
Who then will guide him after Allâh? Will
you not then remember?
al-jatsiyah 45:23
Have you seen him who takes his own lust
(vain desires) as his ilâh (god)?
And Allâh knowing (him as such), left him
astray, and sealed his hearing and his
heart, and put a cover on his sight.
Who then will guide him after Allâh? Will
you not then remember?
al-jatsiyah 45:23
Have you seen him who takes his own lust
(vain desires) as his ilâh (god)?
And Allâh knowing (him as such), left him
astray, and sealed his hearing and his
heart, and put a cover on his sight.
Who then will guide him after Allâh? Will
you not then remember?
al-jatsiyah 45:23
